security_audit.summary: Pure prompt-based skill containing only Markdown documentation. No executable code, no file access, no network activity. All files define workflows and templates for the AI to follow. Zero security risks detected.

content.user_title: Manage Workflow Handoffs and Auto-Fix Review Issues
content.value_statement: Managing handoffs between PM and implementation roles requires consistent templates and clear communication. This skill provides structured handoff templates for task delegation and automated fix workflows for review comments.
actual_capabilities: Generate structured handoff messages from PM to implementation role
Create completion reports from implementation to PM
Track task status in Plans.md with markers
Apply consistent formatting for all handoff documents
Preview and approve fixes before application
limitations: Requires Plans.md to exist for task tracking
Cannot make decisions about scope without user input
Git commands require git repository to be present
Does not execute fixes without user approval

use_cases.title: Delegate Tasks to Dev Team
use_cases.description: Generate clear handoff documents with requirements and acceptance criteria for implementation teams.

use_cases.title: Report Completed Work
use_cases.description: Create structured completion reports showing changes made and acceptance criteria met.

use_cases.title: Auto-Fix Review Issues
use_cases.description: Automatically resolve code review findings for security, performance, and quality issues.

prompt_templates.title: Delegate to Dev
prompt_templates.scenario: PM needs to hand off task

best_practices: Update Plans.md with task status before and after handoffs
Include clear acceptance criteria in every handoff
Preview auto-fix changes before approving application
Use git commands to accurately report changes made
anti_patterns: Auto-fixing without reviewing the proposed changes
Skipping the status update in Plans.md

faq.question: What tools does this skill require?
faq.answer: This skill uses Read, Write, Edit, and Bash tools. All are standard Claude Code tools with no special permissions.

faq.question: Can this skill modify my code automatically?
faq.answer: Auto-fix will preview changes first. You must approve before any modifications are applied to your codebase.

faq.question: Does this skill work with any git provider?
faq.answer: Yes. The handoff-to-pm sub-skill runs git status and git diff commands. These work with GitHub, GitLab, Bitbucket, and any git-compatible repository.

faq.question: Is my data safe with this skill?
faq.answer: Yes. This is a prompt-only skill. It generates text templates and does not send data anywhere. All processing happens locally in your Claude Code session.

faq.question: Why is Plans.md required?
faq.answer: Plans.md tracks task status. The skill marks tasks as requested or complete. If Plans.md does not exist, you can create one or use the skill without status tracking.

faq.question: How is this different from 2agent skill?
faq.answer: This skill handles handoffs and auto-fix. For actual 2-agent conversations where two Claude instances talk directly, use the separate 2agent skill.
